channel.title: Caution: Hot Grill
channel.description: Careful, this grill is hot but her takes on adult media are even hotter~ This is the place to find reviews and essays about NSFW shows and movies you can't find anywhere else!

item.title: Ecchi & Hentai Spring 2025 Anime Guide
item.description: Get early impressions on the lewder anime releases of the Spring 2025 season from a certified hentai master!
